price: 3 à l’exception de ceux qui croient, font le bien, se recommandent mutuellement la vraie foi et se recommandent mutuellement la constance.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti watawāṣaw bil-ḥaqi watawāṣaw bil-ṣabri
